titlestmt.titleproper: National Committee on United States-China Relations records, Audiovisual Materials, Record Group 11
A Guide to the National Committee on United States-China Relations records, Audiovisual Materials, Record Group 11 FA1318 FA1318

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-01-18 00:00:23 -0500.

did.unittitle: National Committee on United States-China Relations records, Audiovisual Materials, Record Group 11

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: National Committee on United States-China Relations, Inc.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in one series: Series 1: Audio recordings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Audiovisual recordings of conferences, seminars, symposiums, and IIE programs, events and exhanges.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: Audio Recordings
did.materialspec: All items are 1/4 inch audio tape unless otherwise noted.
